did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle: Lantern Slides from the University of Virginia ca. 1920-1941
did.physdesc: This collection consists of 173 glass lantern slides.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Lantern Slides from the University of Virginia, Accession #13796, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was an archival transfer from the Music Library, 2006.
